snippet: Environmental groups want more study of hydrofracking, while the natural gas industry and upstate landowners expecting royalties want a speedy approval.
abstract: New York State environmental officials are headed into the final phase of work on their proposal to allow hydrofracking of natural gas after processing over 20,000 public comments; environmental groups want further study while the natural gas industry and upstate landowners expecting royalties want a speedy approval.
lead_paragraph: Environmental groups want more study of hydrofracking, while the natural gas industry and upstate landowners expecting royalties want a speedy approval.

headline.seo: New York Rules on Hydrofracking Get 20,000 Comments
headline.main: State Gets 20,000 Comments on Its Gas Drilling Rules by Deadline
headline.print_headline: State Gets 20,000 Comments on Its Gas Drilling Rules by Deadline
